    Subclasses of Card in com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.game_entities.cards
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AirliftCard
    The Airlift Card allows player to transfer your armies over long distances.
    class 
    BlockadeCard
    The blockade card works similarly to the emergency blockade card, however it is less effective.
    class 
    BombCard
    The Bomb Card allows player to target an enemy or neutral territory and kill half of the armies on that territory.
    class 
    DiplomacyCard
    The Diplomacy Card enforces peace between two players for a variable number of turns.
    class 
    EmptyCard
    This card does nothing.
